dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] copied content]
dmca.body:
nc

  _____  

From: info [mailto:info@all-loans-online.com] 
Sent: Friday, March 18, 2005 10:06 AM
To: The Planet Policy Enforcement
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [Fwd: [ABUSE] copied content]



Hi, 

 

A week has passed and I have yet to hear any response regarding this matter.

 

 

On Thu, 10 Mar 2005 03:57:17 -0600, The Planet Policy Enforcement wrote:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] copied content
Date:         Wed, 9 Mar 2005 14:58:53 -0300
From:         info <info@all-loans-online.com>
To:         <legal-response@theplanet.com>
CC:         support@theplanet.com, abuse@theplanet.com



Dear Sirs,



Do you have a domain by the name of search2008.com as a part of your
network?  My research is showing that their server IP is a part of
Theplanet.com Internet Services Inc.



Referenced here:



http://www.whois.sc/search2008.com



SEARCH2008.COM has copied the content in exact form from our site
http://www.all-loans-online.com



Here is an example:



http://www.all-loans-online.com/auto/index.html



http://www.search2008.com/auto/



You will notice that the title of their page even duplicates our domain
name.



This is a snapshot from Nov. 2002 on Archive.org to verify our content
is original



http://web.archive.org/web/20021121234017/www.all-loans-online.com/



Search2008.com's name server is NS2.GETPAIDSOLUTIONS.COM



Getpaidsolutions.com's name server is  NS1.HOSTRINO.COM



Both Getpaidsolutions.com and Hostrino.com both show their IP addresses
as part of Theplanet.com Internet Services Inc.



Referenced here:

http://www.whois.sc/getpaidsolutions.com

http://www.whois.sc/hostrino.com



I have contacted all three domains and have yet to receive a reply.  I
would like this matter sorted immediately.



Regards,



All Loans Online




- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
THe Planet Internet Services, LLC
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.6 (GNU/Linux)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCMBn9vK/XpJs6oyURAsD6AJ0UGop2Dd7Gt4Opjf+SgAvb/n+LOACgliOl
zy4W4nyKSzCRlinSClK7raI=
=ndvG
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
